taskDescription: p-Nitrophenol and 2,6-dimethyl-4-nitrophenol both have pKa = 7.15, but 3,5-dimethyl-4-nitrophenol has pKa = 8.25. Why is 3,5-dimethyl-4-nitrophenol so much less acidic?
